String: # Claude Log Processor - Action Plan

## ðŸŽ¯ Mission
Build the smallest, least over-engineered Claude log processor that:
1. Parses JSONL conversation logs
2. Transforms them into UI-ready components
3. Works perfectly with 100% test coverage
4. Uses TDD from the very first line

## ðŸ—ï¸ Architecture (Simple & Testable)
```
JSONL â†’ Parser â†’ Transformer â†’ UI Components â†’ Stream
```

## ðŸ“‹ Build Order (TDD - Red, Green, Refactor)

### Day 1: Core Parsing (4 hours)
- [ ] Project setup (TypeScript, Vitest, RxJS)
- [ ] Type definitions
- [ ] `identifyMessageType()` - Simplest pure function
- [ ] `identifyContentType()` - Handle all content blocks
